participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Curious and adventurous, always seeking new experiences and knowledge.
participant_1.background: i am an avid kayaker. i am also a graduate student. i enjoy reading journals and guides related to psychology. my parents taught me survival skills. i walk dogs for a living.

participant_2.name: Mike
participant_2.personality: Family-oriented and hardworking, loves spending time with loved ones and values practicality.
participant_2.background: i have three children. i'm a plumber. my wife and kids are the best. my favorite ice cream flavor is chocolate.

content.text: what's your favourite ice cream flavor?
